useCase.name: View Medical Forms for Allergy Preparedness

mainSequence.step: Camp Administrator requests to view medical forms
Camp Management Platform queries medical forms from Database
Database returns medical forms to Camp Management Platform
Camp Management Platform displays medical forms to Camp Administrator
Camp Administrator selects a specific camper
Camp Management Platform queries the camper's medical form from Database
Database returns the selected camper's medical form to Camp Management Platform
Camp Management Platform displays the selected camper's medical form to Camp Administrator
